Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka

The kuka package contains a simple control example for a kuka LBR iiwa 7.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LbrIiwa
    This interface makes the kuka and the vrep marble labyrinth implementation interchangeable.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JointControl
    The joint control class controls a single joint using pitch data
    KukaServer
    This is the LBR iiwa control class.
    KukaUtil
    Small helper class for common robot needs.
    MarbleLabyrinthControl
    This class may be used for controlling the robot in a marble-labyrinth friendly way.
    Vrep
    An implementation of the LbrIiwa interface for controlling a kuka lbr iiwa robot in V-REP
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Joint
    An enum to make the robot joints easily identifiable
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RoboticFailure
    Exception thrown when a LbrIiwa implementation could not execute a desired action.

Package de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka Description

The kuka package contains a simple control example for a kuka LBR iiwa 7.
